citation: Proclamation under the Valuation of Land Act 2001 (Tas)
text:
Proclamation under the Valuation of Land Act 2001

I, the Governor in and over the State of Tasmania and its Dependencies in the Commonwealth of Australia, acting with the advice of the Executive Council, by this my proclamation made under section 20(9) of the Valuation of Land Act 2001 –

        (a) fix 1 July 2019 as the date on and after which the fresh valuations of all lands within the valuation districts comprising the municipal areas of Break ODay, Brighton, Burnie, Central Coast, Circular Head, Clarence, George Town, Meander Valley and Northern Midlands come into force; and
        (b) declare that this proclamation takes effect on the day on which its making is notified in the Gazette.
18 June 2019

C. WARNER

Governor

By Her Excellency's Command,

GUY BARNETT

Minister for Primary Industries and Water

Displayed and numbered in accordance with the Rules Publication Act 1953.

Notified in the Gazette on 26 June 2019

This proclamation is administered in the Department of Primary Industries, Parks, Water and Environment.
